tetra/schematic/helmet/basic_skull.name: Simple skull
tetra/schematic/helmet/basic_skull.descr: Replaces the current skull with a new one crafted from the provided material.
tetra.module.helmet/basic_skull.name: Simple skull
tetra.module.helmet/basic_skull.descript: A simple helmet skull. The helmet skull is the primary source of integrity for helmets.
tetra/schematic/helmet/heavy_skull.name: Heavy skull
tetra/schematic/helmet/heavy_skull.descr: Replaces the current skull with a new one crafted from the provided material.
tetra.module.helmet/heavy_skull.name: Heavy skull
tetra.module.helmet/heavy_skull.descript: A heavy helmet skull providing knockback resistance. The helmet skull is the primary source of integrity for helmets.
